name: Sriram Kailasam
content: Sriram Kailasam << IIT Mandi Sriram Kailasam Phone: 1905-267120 EMail: sriramk[at]iitmandi[dot]ac[dot]in Address: A11-5/12, School of Computing and Electrical Engineering IIT Mandi (Kamand Campus), VPO Kamand, Mandi district, HP - 175075 India Research interests Scalable algorithms for Formal Concept Analysis Irregular Tree processing Reactive frameworks Big Data Analytics Education Ph.D., IIT Madras, 2014 B.E., Mumbai University, 2005 Ongoing Project Distributed Algorithms for Formal Concept Analysis, funded by MHRD under SPARC 2019-2022. Other PI: Dr. Sergei Obiedkov (Higher School of Economics Moscow)Co-investigators: Dr. Astrid Kiehn, Dr. Aleksey Buzmakov (Higher School of Economics Perm). Completed Project Design of Advanced Big Data Analytics in the CygNet Management System for Large Telecom Networks, funded by MHRD, 2016-2021. Co-investigators: Dr. A D Dileep, Prof. Timothy A Gonsalves, Dr. Samar Agnihotri, Dr. Aditya Nigam, Dr. Varun Dutt, IIT Mandi.
